about_the_game:
You have only one hundred days. One hundred days to pay off your debt to a dreaded pirate lord. Luckily, you have friends, and one of those friends has a spaceship… and an idea: make money by transporting people from planet to planet! Seems simple, but this part of the galaxy is riddled with endless dangers. Paying back your debt will be one thing. Surviving this voyage will be another!

You are the Captain:

  • Take-off on your space flight adventure with a fully voice-acted, diverse crew of oddballs and misfits.
  • Take the helm of the starship Chaser and strategically divert limited power between its four systems in real time.
  • Pilot through treacherous interstellar obstacles such as asteroids, minefields, radiation storms, ship graveyards, and more!
  • Escape from deadly foes including ruthless pirates, relentless bounty hunters, and warring galactic armies.

Pay Back Your Debt:

  • Earn money by transporting a large variety of human and alien clients to other planets.
  • Survive randomly generated encounters as you travel to your client’s destination.
  • Be careful! Repairing your hull costs money. The better your piloting, the more likely you are to survive and pay off your debt in time.

Fly Through a Small Part of a Larger Galaxy:

  • Witness an escalating galactic war, as two major powers fight for control of the sector.
  • Visit over 250 planets and meet the species that inhabit them.
  • Unlock entries in your crew journal containing history, politics, and stories of the galaxy.
  • Learn about your crew’s pasts and discover their secrets.

Additional Features:

  • Enjoy the game in three modes that shape your experience.
    • Fly casual in Voyager Mode. In this mode, you have unlimited respawns and plenty of options to control the game’s difficulty.
    • Survive in Captain Mode. As time goes on, your adventure gets more and more challenging. You only have one life, so make it count.
    • Prove you’re the best in Ace Mode and survive the ultimate test of skill!
  • Fly through the galaxy accompanied by an epic soundtrack.
  • Deck out the Chaser your way with colors that reflect your style.
  • Equip over 20 insignias that let you change the Chaser’s capabilities, take on new challenges, or fly as a member of different factions.
  • See yourself improve as a pilot with high score records.
  • Practice your skills by recreating any scenario in the Flight Simulator. (Release TBD)

short_description: Pilot the Chaser through dangerous interstellar terrain and shake off hostile pursuers in this 2D single-player space flight adventure. Survive the voyage with your oddball crew and transport clients to pay off your debt to a notorious pirate lord before it’s too late!
